metadata.dc:author: Baeza-Bacab, M
Sienra-Monge, J J
metadata.dc:description: Is a brief review of the allergic rhinosinusitis, the role of the immunology in the etiopathogenesis, remarking the importance of the good clinical study which is the corner stone of the diagnosis and which what others diseases make a differential diagnosis. We present also some of the ways to treat the rhinosinusitis including preventive drugs, hyposensitivity and symptomatic medications.
